mapper.select: /* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.admin.authUser.repository.AuthUserMapper.selectListAuthUser */ select ca.auth_id --권한아이디 , ca.user_id --사용자아이디 , ca.reg_id , ca.reg_dt , ca.mod_id , ca.mod_dt , (case when #{lang} = 'lng_type_1' then vu.user_nm_kg else vu.user_nm_ru end) as user_nm , (case when #{lang} = 'lng_type_1' then vu.dept_nm_kg when #{lang} = 'lng_type_2' then vu.dept_nm_ru else vu.dept_nm_ko end) as dept_nm , vu.poly_nm from kgst.com_auth_user ca left join view_user_member vu on vu.user_id = ca.user_id where ca.auth_id = #{authId}
